description:
Drive your car on the looping conveyor belt where tight platforming awaits you. Use your ride's built-in rocket jump and turbo to nimbly overcome traps. Remember, speed isn't always the best option - some situations will require patience! 

Rolling Car features 30 exciting levels of increasing difficulty that will put your skills to the test! Dangerous saws, spikes, rockers or multi-level constructions requiring daring jumps - all in precisely designed riddle levels. 

Features: 

- Precision driving with tight platforming
- Car with many available colours and enhancements - turbo and jump 
- 30 challenges with many obstacles to overcome
- Puzzles that require driving skills and quick decision-making
- Lots of collectables to discover
name: Rolling Car
